name: socket-io-bot
description: A robot that lets you build chatting programs

scripts.test: @echo off && cd.. && if exist .\socket.io-client ( echo "socket-io-bot is already installed on your computer" && exit 0 ) else ( echo "Error: missing socket.io-client" && exit 1 )
